pages.text: $(thing)Barathos$() contains several structures to look out for, spread throughout the lands. Keep an eye out for them
pages.title: Structures

pages.text: This large tower contains plenty of loot, as well as a Mineralization Station. However, it's guarded by swarms of Tharaflies, which can easily become too much to handle
This building houses the Baron Lottoman
These sprawling platforms contain a Baroness Altar, which can be used to summon the Baroness
Hive Nests are home to the Hive King, who can be summoned at the Hive Spawner with a Hive Egg
